CommandLineArgs.Name: g_command_line_args
Content: L"Root", L"The directory to initialize the vfs with. this is similar as setting the working root directory"
L"Help", L"This will list all command line arguments for the executable"
L"LogLevel", L"Specify log level per logger (eg. -LogLevel=Engine=trace,Renderer=info)"
L"BreakOnBoot", L"Break on boot so you can attach a debugger"
L"AttachOnBoot", L"Attach the debugger on boot"
